message: Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product, which I believe will be a valuable asset to your company. My asking price is $1,000,000. I'm confident this is a fair price considering the significant value you'll gain from it. Let's discuss further.
Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget allows me to only spend up to $950,000. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints. I'm willing to come down to $975,000 to make this deal work. This price still reflects the product's value and provides a good return for me. Let's close this deal!
